articles.title: Sea of Thieves is getting a battle pass and seasons in 2021 - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Sea of Thieves is getting a new series of content in the form of a free battle pass and seasons beginning in 2021. There will be plenty of new player rewards, cosmetics, and more to be earned as well.
articles.content: Sea of Thieves is getting something of a sea change starting in January 2021. The multiplayer pirate adventure will be adding a battle pass progression system as well as in-game seasons. Additionally… [+2122 chars]
